name: JoldzicOS
short_description:
Joldzic OS 3.31 "Patricia" Beta Build 102 (based off Linux Mint 12 "Lisa") will be released August 28, 2012 at 3:00AM (Time Zone: UTC-05:00 Eastern Standard Time/New York). This build does not use GNOME 2 or 3, but instead runs off a modifed version of XFCE.

Joldzic Operating System version 3.31. This is the new Operating System the Joldzic Network is working on, and currently our largest project. It is taking our main focus, and is the flagship project of the Joldzic Network. Witness Linux desktop computing the way it was meant to be! The OS is based off of Ubuntu Linux and Linux Mint, sharing a codebase with both OS'es. 

Joldzic OS 3.31 "Patricia" Beta Build 100 is available now for download!
summary: Introducing an OS that's the best of ALL worlds!
